cases.title: Google LLC v. Oracle America, Inc.
cases.court: Supreme Court of the United States
cases.description: Landmark copyright case regarding software APIs and fair use doctrine
cases.outcome: Google's use of Java APIs ruled as fair use

cases.title: Data Protection Commissioner v. Facebook Ireland Ltd
cases.court: Court of Justice of the European Union
cases.description: Schrems II case invalidating EU-US Privacy Shield framework
cases.outcome: Privacy Shield invalidated, stricter requirements for data transfers

cases.title: Riley v. California
cases.court: Supreme Court of the United States
cases.description: Landmark digital privacy case establishing warrant requirement for cell phone searches
cases.outcome: Warrant required for cell phone searches incident to arrest

cases.title: Google Spain SL v. Agencia Española de Protección de Datos
cases.court: Court of Justice of the European Union
parties: Agencia Española de Protección de Datos
cases.description: Landmark case establishing the 'Right to be Forgotten' under EU law
cases.outcome: Establishment of Right to be Forgotten for EU citizens

cases.title: Alice Corp. v. CLS Bank International
cases.court: United States Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit
cases.description: Landmark software patent case establishing test for patent eligibility of software inventions
cases.outcome: Two-step test for software patent eligibility established

cases.title: European Commission v. Meta Platforms Ireland Ltd
cases.description: Antitrust investigation into Meta's data practices and market dominance

cases.title: In re: Facebook, Inc. Consumer Privacy User Profile Litigation
cases.court: United States District Court for the Northern District of California
cases.description: Class action lawsuit regarding Cambridge Analytica data scandal

cases.title: La Quadrature du Net v. Premier ministre
cases.court: Court of Justice of the European Union
cases.description: Case regarding data retention requirements and fundamental rights
cases.outcome: Strict limitations on data retention for national security

cases.title: Carpenter v. United States
cases.court: Supreme Court of the United States
cases.description: Landmark case establishing Fourth Amendment protection for cell site location information
cases.outcome: Warrant required for historical cell site location information

cases.title: Lloyd v. Google LLC
cases.court: Supreme Court of the United Kingdom
cases.description: Representative action regarding Safari workaround tracking
cases.outcome: Claim allowed to proceed as representative action
